mapper.insert: INSERT INTO URBTYOFCTLLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL( HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, PBLANC_NO, HOUSE_NM, HOUSE_SECD, HOUSE_SECD_NM, HOUSE_DTL_SECD, HOUSE_DTL_SECD_NM, SEARCH_HOUSE_SECD, HSSPLY_ZIP, HSSPLY_HSHLDCO, TOT_SUPLY_HSHLDCO, RCRIT_PBLANC_DE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, PRZWNER_PRESNATN_DE, CNTRCT_CNCLS_BGNDE, CNTRCT_CNCLS_ENDDE, HMPG_ADRES, BSNS_MBY_NM, MDHS_TELNO, MVN_PREARNGE_YM, HSSPLY_ADRES ) VALUES(#{house_manage_no}, #{pblanc_no}, #{house_nm}, #{house_secd}, #{house_secd_nm}, #{house_dtl_secd}, #{house_dtl_secd_nm}, #{search_house_secd}, #{hssply_zip}, #{hssply_hshldco}, #{tot_suply_hshldco}, #{rcrit_pblanc_de}, #{subscrpt_rcept_bgnde}, #{subscrpt_rcept_endde}, #{przwner_presnatn_de}, #{cntrct_cncls_bgnde}, #{cntrct_cncls_endde}, #{hmpg_adres}, #{bsns_mby_nm}, #{mdhs_telno}, #{mvn_prearnge_ym}, #{hssply_adres})
